title: Fisherman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Cast your fishing rod onto a player's house at night, marking them.
- Reel in your fishing rod to kill a marked player's visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you reel in your fishing rod, you will deal a Powerful attack to all of their visitors.
- You can have fishing rod cast at up to three players at once.
- If you attack a Townie, all of the other visitors to the visited player will live.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You were assassinated by the Fisherman!"
"They were killed by the Fisherman."

desc:
Post 264
*Fish got boring, and, well, everyone's always telling you to go bigger.*
